clinical_study.brief_title: Expanding Rapid Ascertainment Networks of Schizophrenia Families in Taiwan
clinical_study.official_title: Expanding Rapid Ascertainment Networks of Schizophrenia Families in Taiwan

study_pop.textblock: schizophrenia Han Chinese Population one sibling with his/her parents

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Schizophrenia
- Trio families (a proband's parents should be recruited)
Exclusion Criteria:
- One or both parents of a proband was not alive
- with mental retardation
- with epilepsy
- with alcohol or substance abuse
- with other organic brain syndromes

overall_official.affiliation: College of Medicine, National Taiwan University
